description: My job is to maintain an e-commerce web application for Ford car sales. Our team manages this application in almost twenty markets across Europe, we use exclusively AEM (Adobe Experience Manager), browser DevTools for data checking and error detection, and JIRA for task management and time tracking.

My job is to maintain an e-commerce web application for Ford car sales. Our team manages this application in almost twenty markets across Europe, we use exclusively AEM (Adobe Experience Manager), browser DevTools for data checking and error detection, and JIRA for task management and time tracking.

When I joined the studio.čtyry it was a tiny online marketing agency that didn't even have a name yet. In the beginning, I did what was needed, from the preparation of publishing plans for social networks, through the creation of content to the creation of websites. We created the website in the Czech template solution solidpixels.cz in close cooperation with clients.

My job is to maintain an e-commerce web application for Ford car sales.
